document.full_text: ice cold for three quarters of thursday's game five, dwyane wade caught fire in the fourth and led miami to an 83-80 win over chicago that put the heat in the nba finals.
document.title: wade finds a spark to lead heat's fourth-quarter charge
lines_and_colors: ice cold for three quarters of thursday's game five, dwyane wade caught fire in the fourth and led miami to an 83-80 win over chicago that put the heat in the nba finals.
